description: The mischievous Asgardian god of mischief, brother of Thor, known for his cunning schemes and shape-shifting abilities, often oscillating between villainy and anti-heroism.
A brilliant but arrogant neurosurgeon turned Sorcerer Supreme who defends Earth against mystical threats, wielding powerful magic and ancient artifacts.
The Mad Titan, obsessed with balancing the universe by wiping out half of all life, wielding the Infinity Gauntlet with its six powerful Infinity Stones, posing a threat to the entire cosmos.
Physicist Bruce Banner, exposed to gamma radiation, transforms into the Hulk, a massive, green-skinned behemoth with incredible strength, while battling inner turmoil and fighting for justice.

A skilled marksman and master archer, Clint Barton, aka Hawkeye, fights alongside the Avengers, utilizing his exceptional accuracy and combat prowess to take down threats, all while maintaining a grounded perspective and dry wit.
Highly skilled former Russian spy and assassin turned Avenger, Natasha Romanoff, uses her exceptional combat skills and espionage expertise to fight for justice and redemption.
Possessing reality-warping powers from experimentation with the Mind Stone, Wanda Maximoff struggles with her traumatic past while battling alongside the Avengers and exploring her magical abilities.

High school student Peter Parker gains spider-like abilities after a radioactive spider bite, becoming the web-slinging superhero Spider-Man, fighting crime while balancing his personal life and responsibilities.
Formerly Steve Rogers' best friend and sidekick, Bucky Barnes is brainwashed and turned into a deadly assassin by Hydra, grappling with his past while fighting alongside the Avengers.
Master thief Scott Lang inherits the Ant-Man suit, allowing him to shrink in size while increasing in strength, embarking on heists and heroics as a member of the Avengers.
